description: Get prepared for another famous Trystan Bull solo scene.He's been working very hard lately, getting enough scenes together to launch this awesome new site you're looking at right now.But when there's all work and no play, life gets a bit boring, so you have to make room for some self satisfying activities...and since we're a bunch of perverts, a bit of masturbation does the trick.So lube up your shaft and enjoy yourself as Trystan gives us quite the show in our cabin, and then finished up on our deck.
title: Self Satisfying Activities
